Title: Men make a difference - AIDS
Publisher: Disease Control Department of the Ministry of Public Health (卫生部疾病控制司), China Health Education Research Institute (中国健康教育研究所)
Notes: Long title:To prevent AIDS is men's unshrinkable responsibility Yufang aizibing nanshi zewupangdai (预防艾滋病男士责无旁贷)Original idea for the poster design by Fang Xiaojie; Photograph taken by Feng Qingang.
